CreateUserRequest.name: CreateUserRequest
CreateUserRequest.description: CreateUserRequest is the request to create a new user.

representations.jsonSchema: {"description":"CreateUserRequest is the request to create a new user.","properties":{"password":{"description":"Password to create","type":"string"},"username":{"description":"Username to create","type":"string"}},"required":["username","password"],"type":"object"}

CreateUserResponse.description: CreateUserResponse is the response to a create user request.

representations.jsonSchema: {"description":"CreateUserResponse is the response to a create user request.","properties":{"createdAt":{"description":"Creation timestamp","format":"date-time","type":"string"},"url":{"description":"URL to the user","format":"uri","nullable":true,"type":"string"},"userID":{"description":"ID of the created user","type":"string"}},"required":["userID","createdAt"],"type":"object"}

GetTeamRequest.name: GetTeamRequest
GetTeamRequest.description: GetTeamRequest is the request to get a team.

fields.name: teamID
fields.description: ID of the team to get

PingResponse.name: PingResponse
PingResponse.description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.

representations.jsonSchema: {"description":"PingResponse is the response to a ping request.","properties":{"message":{"description":"Human-readable message","type":"string"},"metadata":{"nullable":true,"type":"string"},"status":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/PingStatus"}},"required":["message","status"],"type":"object"}

PingStatus.name: PingStatus
PingStatus.description: PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

enumValues.description: PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.
PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.

representations.jsonSchema:
{"description":"PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

Possible values:
- `ERROR`: **[DEPRECATED]** Use PingStatusErrorV2 instead. - PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.
- `OK`: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
","enum":["ERROR","OK"],"type":"string"}

User.name: User
User.description: User represents a user in the system.

representations.jsonSchema: {"description":"User represents a user in the system.","properties":{"name":{"deprecated":true,"description":"Name of the user","type":"string"},"userID":{"description":"ID of the user","type":"string"}},"required":["userID","name"],"type":"object"}

GET.description: Check if the server is alive
Get a team by its ID

parameters.name: teamID
parameters.description: ID of the team to get

databaseSchema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "schema_migrations" (version varchar(128) primary key);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "user" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  "name" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "email" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "password" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "created_at" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  "updated_at" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
, "last_login" TIMESTAMP);
